creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: man in short blue pants, sandals, and short top and conical hat plays flute at UL; standing above costumed figure with arched back; costume has large, draping green back with large white spots, white mane, tufted black hair, and red face with exaggerated features; human legs poke out at bottom
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
title: Samurai, Boatman, Lion Dance, Southern Islander
